title: Email
body: So it all happened when I switched my phone card and I didn't have access to the phone card so I could access the email, on this account of lol I shoved money and I struggled to do level 30, I no longer have access to that email on my account , I have evidence with the purchases of the game and the rest... I just want to be able to change my email from my account with that email.

replies.body: No worries, our account team can assist you directly!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so they can update your info and clear things up.  See you there!
I recommend that you submit a support ticket for this issue. Itâ€™ll be better to provide them with proof if required rather than an open board when dealing with personal information.
If you would like to send a support ticket, you would have to go to the support tab and click submit a ticket.
